q: why do they want to put things in the tank
pred: The person in the video is using a knife to cut up potatoes and then putting them in a bowl. They then put the bowl in the sink and wash the potatoes. After washing, they put the potatoes in the bowl and add salt. The person then adds water to the bowl and places it on the table. They then take a knife and cut the potatoes into smaller pieces. Finally, they add the potatoes to the bowl and put the bowl in the sink.
